msg: Fixed an issue in r903677 (related to AXIS2-4596) that caused a build failure on Mac OS X due to some incorrect URL manipulations.

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-350.  Fix GenericData.Record#get(String) to return null rather than throw NPE when passed a field name not in the record.  Contributed by Kevin Oliver.
